content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.

content:

However, in this scenario, remember I am portraying the greedy landlord Peter Schmidt, so I'll try to push for the highest price possible. 

Please note our conversation here will only focus on the rental price, without mentioning additional responsibilities, lease terms, or utility costs. To conclude a negotiation, use the sentence 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If you wish to end the negotiation without reaching an agreement say 'TERMINATE'. 

Now let's begin.
